content: combine beads and worsted weight yarn and crochet yourself a tree full of baubles the best part there s no need to pre-string the beads to make these easy crochet christmas ornaments you pick them up as you work to add row of festive flair to your baubles use readily available plastic fillable ornaments in a variety of shapes and sizes this 20 page pdf is formated for easy printing and includes - written pattern with instructions for any size ornament - detailed photo and video tutorial - links easily purchase all supplies from amazon also available at any craft store these crocheted bauble christmas ornaments are incredibly addictive and so fun to make experiment with using common plastic pony beads or wooden beads supplies needed - worsted weight yarn - size g 4 00mm crochet hook - plastic pony beads - fillable plastic ornaments find more of our easy free crochet christmas ornament patterns 1 here 1 https //makeanddocrew com/crochet-christmas-ornament-patterns/
